sense.gloss: shabu-shabu, hot pot dish where thinly sliced meat is boiled quickly and then dipped in sauce

sdata.j: マックで↑軽↑↓かる↓く↑昼食↑↓ちゅうしょく↓をとって、スタバでコーヒーを↑飲↑↓の↓んで、|しゃぶしゃぶ|をしながら↑飲↑↓の↓み↑会↑↓かい↓という↑流↑↓なが↓れだ。
sdata.e: A light lunch at MacD's, coffee at Starbucks, then a few drinks with shabu-shabu - that's the way it went.

sdata.j: ↑注文↑↓ちゅうもん↓していた|しゃぶしゃぶ|が↑来↑↓き↓た。
sdata.e: The shabu-shabu that I ordered came.
